outputs.output_descr:
The project will aim to strengthen good refrigeration practices, including recovery and recycling and retrofitting of fixed and mobile systems using drop in replacement refrigerants by building on the progress that has already taken place under the related training programmes of the Refrigerant Managment Plan (RMP).  The outputs associated with this project are:-

Output 1. Establishment of a Monitoring, Evaluation and Reporting Mechanism.
Output 2. Enforcement of the Licensing Systems and Prevention of Illegal Trade.
Output 3. Training and Certification of Technicians and Establisment  of an Association of Refrigeration Tecnicians. 
Output 3. Provision of Equipment and Retrofit Demonstration.

project_descr: TERMINAL PHASE-OUT MANAGEMENT PLAN FOR CHLORO FLUORO CARBONS IN ST. KITTS AND NEVIS
